title: Integrate Usergeek tracking snippet into frontend with provided API key

requirements.text: Add the Usergeek tracking snippet to the frontend HTML entry point and configure it with API key `014402022A34A8626A6C124A58B6197F`.

quotes: Please add the Usergeek tracking snippet to my frontend in the correct file and configure it with my API key = 014402022A34A8626A6C124A58B6197F

acceptanceCriteria: The Usergeek tracking snippet is added to the frontend entry file `frontend/index.html` (e.g., inside `<head>` or immediately before `</body>`), without breaking existing metadata or the `/src/main.tsx` module script tag.
The snippet is configured to use API key `014402022A34A8626A6C124A58B6197F` exactly as provided.
After building and running the app, the browser loads the Usergeek tracking script without console errors attributable to the integration.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce any backend changes; integration must be frontend-only.
nonGoals: Adding new analytics events beyond the standard Usergeek snippet.
Implementing a consent banner or cookie preferences UI.
